data.title: Stirnet
data.text: Hugh Capet, King of France (b 941, d 24.10.966)Â§A m. (968/70) Alice/Adelaide of Aquitaine/Poitou/Rouen (b 950, d 15.06.1006, dau of William/Guillaume I/III 'Towhead', Count of Poitou, Duke of Aquitaine) 1. Robert II 'the Pious', King of France (b 27.03.972, d 20.07.1031) m1. (988, div 992) Suzanne / Rosele of Ivrea (b 945, d 26.01.1003, dau of Berengar II, King of Italy) m2. (997, div 1003-5) Bertha of Bourgogne (d after 1016, dau of Rudolf III, King of Burgundy) A. child (b/d 999) m3. (1003) Constance d'Arles (b c986, d 25.07.1032, dau of Guillaume II, Count of Arles and Provence) B. Hughes III 'le Grand', King of France (b 1007, d 1026) C. Henry I, King of France (b 1008, d 04.08.1060) m1. Matilda (d 1034, dau of Emperor Konrad II) m2. (1043) Matilda de Frise (d 1044, dau of Liudolf, Margrave of Friesland) m3. Anna of Kiev (b 1024, d 1076, dau of Yaroslav I, Prince of Kiev) i. Philippe I, King of France (b 1053, d 29.07.1108) m1. (1072, div 1092) Bertha of Holland (b c1055, d 1094, dau of Floris I, Count of Holland) a. Louis VI 'le Gros', King of France (b 1081, d 01.08.1137) m1. (1104, div 1107) Lucienne de Rochefort (d after 1137) (1) Isabelle of France (b c1105, d after 1175) m. (before 1119) Guillaume de Vermandois, Sn de Chaumont m2. (04.1115) Adelaide of Savoy (b 1092, d 18.11.1154, dau of Umberto II, Count of Savoy, Susa, etc) (2) Louis VII 'le Jeune', King of France (b 1120, d 18.09.1180, 2nd son) m1. (22.07.1137, div 1152) Eleanor, Duchess of Aquitaine (b 1122, d 31.03.1204, dau of William/Guillaume VIII/X, Duke of Aquitaine) (A) Marie de France (b 1145, d 11.03.1198) GHJSWY m. (1164) Henry I de Blois, Count of Champagne (b 1126, d 17.03.1181) GHJSWY (B) Alix de France (b 1151, d after 1195) GHSY m. (1164) Thibaut V 'le Bon', Count de Blois et Chartres (b c1130, d Acre 1191) GHSY m2. (before 18.11.1153) Constanza of Castile (b 1141, d 04.10.1160, dau of Alfonso VII, King of Castile and Leon) (C) Marguerite de France, Countess de Vexin (b 1158, d 1197) m1. (1160/1172) Henry Plantagenet, Duke of Normandy (b 28.02.1155, d 1183) m2. (1186, sp) Bela III, King of Hungary (b 1148, d 23.04.1196) (D) Adelaide de France (b 1159, d 1160) m3. (13/8.11.1160) Alix de Blois (b 1140, d 04.06.1206, dau of Thibaut IV, Count de Blois, Troyes, etc) (E) Philippe II Auguste, King of France (b 22.08.1165, d 14.07.1223) GHJSWY m1. (28.04.1180) Isabelle, Countess of Artois (b 1170, d 15.03.1190) GHJSWY m2. (14.08.1193, div 1193, rem 1200) Ingeborg of Denmark (b 1175, d 1236) m3. (06.1196, div 1200) Agnes von Andeche (d 1201) (F) Alix de France, Countess de Vexin (b 1170) GHJSWY m. (20.08.1195) Guillaume III Talvas, Count de Ponthieu et de Montruil (b c1177, d 1221) GHJSWY (G) Agnes/Anne de France (b 1171, d 1240) m1. (1180) Alexios II Komnenos, Emperor of Byzantium (b 1167, d 1183) m2. (1183) Andronicus I Komnenos, Emperor of Byzantium (b 1110, d 12.09.1185) m3. (1204/5) Theodoros Branas, Sn of Adrianople (3) Robert I 'le Grand', Count de Dreux (b 1123, d 11.10.1188, 6th son) GHJSWY m1. (c1140) Agnes de Garlande (b 1122, d 1143, dau of Anseau de Garlande, Count de Rochefort) m2. (c1144) Hedwige d'Evreux (b 1118, d 1152, dau of Gauier d'Evreux, Earl of Salisbury) GHJSY m3. (1152) Agnes, Countess de Braine (b 1130, d 1202/18, dau of Guy de Baudement, Count de Braine) GHJSWY (4) Pierre I, Sn de Courtenay (b 1126, d 1182, 8th son) EGHJSY m. (after 1150) Elizabeth, heiress of Courtenay (b c1135, d after 14.09.1205, dau of Renauld de Courtenay) EGHJSY (5) Constance of France (b 1124, d 16.08.1176) m1. (1140) Eustace IV de Blois, Count de Boulogne (b 1127, dsp 10.08.1154) m2. (1154, div 1165/6) Raimon V, Count of Toulouse (b 1134, d 1194) (6)+ other issue - Philippe (b 1116, d 1131), Henri (b 1121, d 1175, Archbishop of Rheims), Hugues (b 1123, d young), Philippe (b 1125, d 1161, Archbishop of Paris) b. Constance of France (b 1078, d c1124/6) GHJSWY m1. (c1094, div 1104) Hugues I de Blois, Count of Troyes (d 14.06.1126) m2. (1106) Bohemund I de Hauteville, Prince of Antioch, Duke of Apulia (d 07.03.1111) GHJSWY c.+ other issue - Henri (b 1083, d young), Charles (b 1085, d young), Eudes (b 1087, d 1096) m2. (1092, sep 1104) Bertrade de Montfort (d 14.02.1117, dau of Simon I, Count de Montfort) f. Philippe, Count de Nantes (b 1093, d after 1123) m. (1104) Elizabeth de Montlhery (d after 03.03.1141) g. Fleury, Sn de Nagis (b c1093, d after 1118) m. _ de Nagis (a 1100) h. Eustachie de France m. Jean, Count d'Etampes i. Cecile de France (b 1097, d after 1145) m1. (1106) Tancred de Hauteville, Pr of Antioch (d 1112) m2. (1115) Pons de Toulouse, Count of Tripoli (b 1098, d 1137) ii. Robert of France (b 1055, d 1060) iii. Hugh I 'le Grand' de Crepe, Count de Vermandois et de Valois (b 1057, d 18.10.1101) m. (after 1067) Adelaide, Countess of Vermandois and Valois (b c1062, d c1122, dau of Heribert IV, Count de Vermandois) a. Raoul I 'le Vaillant', Count de Vermandois et de Valois (b 1085, d 1152) m1. (1120/5, div 1142) Eleonore de Blois (dau of Etienne, Count de Blois) (1) Hugh II 'le Moine', Count de Vermandois et de Valois (b 1127, dsp 1212, became a monk) m2. (1142, div 1151) Alix / Petronille of Aquitaine (b c1125, d 1153, dau of William, Duke of Aquitaine) (2) Raoul II, Count de Vermandois et de Valois (b 1145, dsp 1167) m. (c1160) Margaret of Lorraine, Countess of Flanders (b 1145, d 1194, dau of Thierry I of Lorraine, Count of Flanders) (3) Mabile, Countess de Vermandois et de Valois (b 1143, dsp 1183) m. (1159) Philip I of Lorraine, Count of Flanders (b c1143, d 1191) m3. (1152) Laurette of Lorraine (b c1120, d 1175, dau of Thierry I of Lorraine, Count of Flanders) (4) Eleonore, Countess de Vermandois et de Valois (b 1152, d after 1222) m(1?). Geoffrey, Count of Ostervant (b 1147, dvpsp 1163, of Hainault family) m2. (before 1167) Guillaume IV, Count of Nevers (d 1168) m3. (c1170) Matthias of Lorraine, Count of Boulogne (b c1137, d 25.07.1173) m4. (c1175) Mathieu II, Count of Beaumont-sur-Oise (d 1208) m5. (c1210) Etienne II de Blois, Sn de Chatillon-sur-Loing (d 1252) b. Mahaut (Matilde) de Vermandois (b 1080) GHJSWY m. (1090) Raoul I de Beaugency (b c1068, d 1113) GHJSWY c. Beatrix de Vermandois (d after 1144) m. Hugues III de Gournay-en-Bray d. Isabelle (Elisabeth) de Vermandois (b 1085, d 13.02.1131) GHJRSWY m1. (1096, div 1115) Robert de Beaumont, Count of Meulan, 1st Earl of Leicester (b 1050, d 05.06.1118) HJRY m2. (1116/8) William de Warrenne, Earl of Warrenne, 2nd Earl of Surrey (b c1070, d 11.05.1138) GHJRSWY e. Constance de Vermandois m. (1100) Godefroy de la Ferte-Gaucher (chatelain de Meaux) f. Agnes de Vermandois (b c1065, d after 1125) HJSY m. Bonifacio, Marchese del Vasto (d 1125/30) HJSY g.+ other issue - Henri de Chaumont-en-Vexin (d 1130, had issue), Simon (d 1148, Bishop of Noyon), Guillaume (d after 1096) iv. Emma of France (b 1054) D. Robert I 'the Old', Duke de Bourgogne (b 1011, d 31.03.1076) EGHJSWY E. Eudes of France (b c1013, a 1056) F. Adelaide of France, Countess of Auxerre (b c1003) m. (c1015) Renaud I, Count of Nevers (d 29.05.1040) G. Adelle of France, Countess of Coutance (b 1009, d 08.01.1079) GHJSWY m1. Richard III, Duke of Normandy (b c997, d 06.08.1027/28) -- m2. (1028) Baldwin V, Count of Flanders (b c1012, d 01.09.1067) GHJSWY H. Constance of France GHJSWY m. Manasses de Dammartin (d 15.11.1037) GHJSWY partner unknown I. Raoul, Bishop of Bourges 2. Hedwige of France (b c969, d after 1013) GHJSWY m1. (c996) Reginar IV, Count of Hainault and Mons (b after 947, d 1013) GHJSWY m2. Hugues III, Count de Dasbourg 3. Gisele of France, Dame d'Abeville (b c970, d c1000) GHJSWY m. (before 987) Hugues I de Montreuil, Count de Ponthieu (b c970, d c04.07.1000) GHJSWY 4.
